content.raw:
Does atlas_v3_bringup.launch need the multisense_sl relays any longer (such as lines 70-73)?

On line 38 should multisense_sl be multisense?

For lines 50-61 the multisense provides a lidar point cloud on /multisense/lidar_points2 and a stereo camera point clouds on /multisense/image_points2{_color}.  It looks like this is relaying between a stereo based point cloud and a lidar based point cloud.
content.html:
Does atlas_v3_bringup.launch need the multisense_sl relays any longer (such as lines 70-73)?

On line 38 should multisense_sl be multisense?

For lines 50-61 the multisense provides a lidar point cloud on /multisense/lidar_points2 and a stereo camera point clouds on /multisense/image_points2{_color}. It looks like this is relaying between a stereo based point cloud and a lidar based point cloud.
